messages.message: Hey, I know it’s been a while since we talked, but I wanted to know how you’re doing. We’ve really grown apart these last months.
Yeah, I guess. It has been a really long time. I've been busy with other things.
What things? You haven't been to school much recently.
I'm just busy ok. Why do you want to know anyway.
Well, I've just noticed that you haven't been to lacrosse lately and your grades have dropped. Are you doing all right?
I'm fine, nothing's happened, you don't need to worry.
I just want to be there for you. Please talk to me Olivia, I feel like you haven't really been yourself for a while.
I'm fine, I'm just busy with Jack. He's been wanting me to meet some of his friends and I've been spending some time with them.
Have you been living with him? Did you run away from home?
I've just been gone a couple of days. My parents probably haven't even noticed. School and lacrosse aren't priorities now, Jack is.
Why can't you split your time between school and Jack? I'm sure you miss seeing everyone and playing lacrosse.
Are you sure? It's good to have other priorities. I think you'd be happier doing them.
I'm just busy. I don't want to be doing those other things, and I can't anyway. This is how relationships are.
MANY VICTIMS ARE TRAFFICKED BY ROMANTIC PARTNERS
Why would you think that?
It's what he and his friends say.
Well, if it's a normal relationship, what are you so busy with?
I can't tell you. If I tell you, everyone will know, and it's a secret.
I won't tell anyone. I just want you to talk to me, we've become so distant and I just miss knowing about each other.
I just can't tell you. If I did, I'd get in trouble.
Did he threaten you if you told anyone?
PHYSICAL, PSYCHOLOGICAL, AND SEXUAL THREATS ARE USED TO COERCE AND CONTROL VICTIMS
I guess, it's embarrassing to say. You wouldn't really understand.
No, it's not, help me to understand then. I'll never judge you.
He kind of gave me a job to do, and I have to spend a lot of time on that. But I can't tell you what it is.
He has... private photos and videos of me and he'll leak them if I tell anyone. I should've never sent them to him, if anyone finds out my whole life will be ruined.
It's not your fault, you're a teen and I'm pretty sure he's an adult, not a teen as he said.
TRAFFICKERS OFTEN FAKE THEIR IDENTITIES ONLINE TO RECRUIT VICTIMS
He's the one who should know better. I won't tell anyone if you don't want me to.
Yes, please don't tell anyone. I can't let him find out.
If you're comfortable talking about it, what's this job he's making you do? Is it what you'd rather be doing with your time?
It's a lot. What will you think of me? I don't know what I want to do. I miss school, but I don't have time to do schoolwork or go to lacrosse practice.
Even if I did, it's just not the same as before. Nothing's as fun or interesting as it used to be.
I'm not going to judge you, you don't have to be embarrassed or ashamed. Do you think this job might be making you lose interest in other things?
Sometimes he makes me go to these hotels and meet up with his "friends". Since I started, I've just felt different. Everything has been different.
What do you mean by "friends" and different, what do you guys do there?
Well, he sometimes calls them that, to make me more comfortable with doing stuff for them, but they're really just clients.
And different as in, this job is always on my mind, and I'm always worried someone will find out.
Is he making you do things you don't want to do?
Why's the job always on your mind? Is it stressing you out, do you not like it?
He makes me do... sexual things for his clients. I never wanted to do it. Even if I wanted to stop and leave him, I can't.
I'm so worried about what will happen if someone finds out. I keep telling myself that I could've prevented it. It feels like this is my life now.
You can always stop. It's dangerous and scary, but you can do it.
I'm here for you, and it's not your fault, you couldn't have known he would do this. You're just doing your best.
I'm scared, what if he hurts you or someone else I care about? I don't know what he's capable of.
No one has to get hurt. What he's doing is illegal. We can talk to the guidance counselor tomorrow.
They're trained in these types of situations and they'll know what to do. They'll be able to help you out.
I don't know who I can tell, what if they don't understand?
They will understand, the counselors are professionals and they'll know how to get you out of that situation. We can talk to them together, I'll be right there with you.
Alright, let's talk to them tomorrow.
I get it, you're busy. What are you guys doing?
HOTELS AND MOTELS ARE A COMMON VENUE FOR TRAFFICKING.
